Background Utilities

Control background images, colors, and opacity.

Background Size

Control how background images are sized.

Available classes:

  • sb-bg-auto: Original size
  • sb-bg-cover: Cover container
  • sb-bg-contain: Fit within container
  • sb-bg-fill: Stretch to fill

Background Position

Control the starting position of background images.

Available classes:

  • sb-bg-center: Center
  • sb-bg-top: Top
  • sb-bg-right: Right
  • sb-bg-bottom: Bottom
  • sb-bg-left: Left
  • sb-bg-right-top: Right top
  • sb-bg-right-bottom: Right bottom
  • sb-bg-left-top: Left top
  • sb-bg-left-bottom: Left bottom

Background Repeat

Control how background images repeat.

Available classes:

  • sb-bg-repeat: Repeat both x and y
  • sb-bg-no-repeat: No repeat
  • sb-bg-repeat-x: Repeat only horizontally
  • sb-bg-repeat-y: Repeat only vertically
  • sb-bg-repeat-round: Round repeat
  • sb-bg-repeat-space: Space repeat

Gradients

Apply gradient backgrounds.

Available classes:

  • sb-bg-gradient-to-t: Bottom to top
  • sb-bg-gradient-to-r: Left to right
  • sb-bg-gradient-to-b: Top to bottom
  • sb-bg-gradient-to-l: Right to left
  • sb-bg-gradient-to-tr: Bottom-left to top-right
  • sb-bg-gradient-to-bl: Top-right to bottom-left

Opacity

Control the opacity of elements.

Available classes:

  • sb-opacity-0: Transparent
  • sb-opacity-25: 25% opacity
  • sb-opacity-40: 40% opacity
  • sb-opacity-50: 50% opacity
  • sb-opacity-60: 60% opacity
  • sb-opacity-75: 75% opacity
  • sb-opacity-90: 90% opacity
  • sb-opacity-100: Fully opaque
